name: QOL for Going Merry
description: A collection of Quality of Life laws.

properties.Title: Towing Law
properties.UserDescription: This law enables the Mayor of Going Merry to move problematic vehicles.

properties.UserDescription: This law enables everyone to place vehicles on owned land.

properties.Title: Cleaning up
properties.UserDescription: This law enables the collection of debris on owned land in order to help with cleaning up our neighborhood.

properties.Title: District Protection
properties.UserDescription: This law protects districted land. In case you disagree, please contact the Mayor of Going Merry.

Districts.internalDescription:
<foldout><linktext><u>6 Districts</u></linktext><title>6 Districts</title><link="view:87:31230542"><icon name="District" type=""><color=#32270DFF>GM Bridges Revision 18</color></icon></link>

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

properties.Message: This river is protected from claiming in order to keep it beautiful and naturally.

PeopleToSendTo.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

properties.Title: Harbor & Warehouse Protection
properties.UserDescription: This law prevents picking up or placing construction blocks within the harbor & warehouse in case the citizen is not the mayor of Going Merry.

properties.Title: Explosives
properties.UserDescription: This law prohibits the placement of dynamite and mining charges within public infrastructure of Going Merry. Please be cautious!

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.
